title: Aesthetics of brand and identity
content: Please help me making brand and identity rules and techniques, like aesthetics of fonts color using type of business
author: gopan

comments.content:
Hi there.   
   
There is an excellent book out there that covers all the details of successful brands. It helped me immensly.   
   
Marks of Excellence   
 [http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0714838381/qid=1086890576/sr=8-1/ref=sr\_8\_xs\_ap\_i1\_xgl14/104-4540085-2343946?v=glance&s=books&n=507846](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221709/http:/www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/tg/detail/-/0714838381/qid=1086890576/sr=8-1/ref=sr_8_xs_ap_i1_xgl14/104-4540085-2343946?v=glance&s=books&n=507846)

Try [http://www.identityworks.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221709/http:/www.identityworks.com/)  
   
They have a list of several companies who   
have their brand guidelines posted online.

Thanks Peter Markatos,   
for posting Hans Stol's and my site.   
   
Best Regards,   
   
Robert Salzmer   
 [http://www.cidoc.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221709/http:/www.cidoc.net/)
